text: Phyllostylon is a genus of plant in family Ulmaceae. Species include: * Phyllostylon brasiliense Capan. ex Benth. & Hook.f. * Phyllostylon orthopterum Hallier f. * Phyllostylon rhamnoides (J.Poiss.) Taub. Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Rosales genera
title: Phyllostylon
